content: There's fruit growing in the trees? I got this, I got this! Check out my tornado ki — I mean, watch me nicely pick this fruit!
info: 抵达对话-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: From now on, <style=NpcName>Esassani</style>, <style=NpcName>Glenn</style>, and I will be living here with you, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>.
info: 抵达对话-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Now, we can start with the Camp...
info: 抵达对话-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Hoho, mo rush! I'll need a bit of time to prepare a spot in the Camp that we can use to nurture the planet.
info: 抵达对话-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Ah, I'm so sorry! I haven't finished tidying up the Camp yet. So... if you don't mind, could you wait a little longer? <style=SizeSmall>Just a few boxes left to move, then some cleaning and arranging the tables and chairs. I'll be quick...</style>
info: 抵达对话-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: On behalf of <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style>, we'll be with you every step of the way, offering all the help you need to nurture this planet into everything you've ever dreamed of.
info: 抵达对话-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: As you go about <style=Highlight>nurturing the planet,</style> you'll probably find yourself in all kinds of different situations, but, hoho, it's mo big deal.
info: 抵达对话-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: I just caught a scent...{短暂停} There's fruit nearby that might make a great pot of tea. Would you care to join me for a cup while the sun is so pleasant?
info: 抵达对话-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, take a short break and feel free to chat with any of us. Once the Camp is ready, we can enjoy a cup of tea and go over the basics of nurturing a planet.
info: 抵达对话-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Hoho~! So this is what a <style=Highlight>Hexia</style> planet feels like in autumn. Crisp air, clear skies... Truly delightful. Ahem—

content: Hoho~! So this is what a <style=Highlight>Taffeh</style> planet feels like in this season. Still quite hot, isn't it? Be sure to wear sunscreen. Ahem—
